name: The Conversation
description: The Conversation is an independent source of news and views, sourced from the academic and research community and delivered direct to the public. Access to independent, high-quality, authenticated, explanatory journalism underpins a functioning democracy. Our aim is to allow for better understanding of current affairs and complex issues. And hopefully allow for a better quality of public discourse and conversations.

name: Philippine Senate Committee on Rural Development & Social Justice (CORDEVSOJUST)
description: The Philippine Senate Committee on Rural Development & Social Justice website pertaining to "all matters relating to poverty alleviation, human rights, agriculture, increase income, welfare, dignity, good governance and rural development".
